sentences.english: Safety protection device for preventing overload of lifting cargo ladder.
sentences.chinese: 設有防止升降貨梯超載的安全保護裝置。

sentences.english: If there is basement, 1 goods lift need to go to basement.
sentences.chinese: 如果有地下室，必須有一部貨梯直達地下室。

sentences.english: The fire brigade generally uses the lifting ladder.
sentences.chinese: 消防隊普遍使用這種升降貨梯。

sentences.english: The freight elevator in the building was broken.
sentences.chinese: 那棟樓的貨梯已經壞了。

sentences.english: Can three-layer floors, adopt the freight elevator for lifting.
sentences.chinese: 可三層樓面，採用貨梯升降。

sentences.english: Fixed cargo lifter is a kind of mini-crane.
sentences.chinese: 固定式升降貨梯是小型起重機械的一種。

sentences.english: They've managed to keep all of our people around back at the freight entrance.
sentences.chinese: 他們成功地把我們所有的人都保持在貨梯入口附近。
